Posts.Content: MotherofFour wrote: I am in the beginning of week 5 and just noticed some nerve burning sensations tonight in my elbow, a few fingers, and now foot (I guess it's good I haven't been taking Aleve as much so I noticed it !) . I had some skin peeling in the lower part of my armpit this past friday (apparently, a result of the brass bolus every single day, said my rad onco), so I am guessing this is also induced by the rads since it's the same side. I briefly googled this and it said to get treatment for it ASAP but I couldn't find what the treatment was. Other than ending the rads, does anyone else have experience with this one? Just looking for some good questions for my doc tomorrow. Was it treated by the rad onco or oncologist? Dx 2/5/2015, DCIS, Right, 2cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Neuropathy symptoms and Rads - beginning of week 5 MotherofFour MotherofFour

Posts.Content: MotherofFour wrote: I had a skin saving simple mastectomy with expander put in yesterday. They sent me home in a bra-like binder. My surgery site feels better when it is off but they said I had to keep it on to reduce swelling. I am home now, and there is an area around my clavicle.that is getting sort of hard..a big indentation is there befween that and fhe former breast. I am going back to have them look at it tomorrow but I was wonderei g if anyone else had to wear this binde Dx 2/5/2015, DCIS, Right, 2cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Binder after mastectomy? MotherofFour shelly4321
